image_analysis.product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells 1+1=2 KG Pack of 1 KG Each, Anti-Slip Coated Hand Weights for Home Gym & Fitness Training - Pink
key_features: Pair of 1 KG dumbbells for a total of 2 KG weight
Cast iron core with neoprene coating for durability and safety
Anti-slip neoprene surface for a secure, comfortable grip
Hexagonal ends prevent the dumbbells from rolling away
Printed weight number on each end cap for easy identification
Color-coded pink design for quick weight recognition
Suitable for home gym, fitness classes, and resistance training
Non-toxic guarantee badge shown for added material reassurance
image_analysis.usage: Used for strength training, toning, and resistance exercises at home, in fitness classes, or in a personal workout area.
image_analysis.target_audience: Home exercisers, beginners, and fitness enthusiasts looking for light, non-slip dumbbells for workouts and classes.
image_analysis.ai_description: Pair of pink KAKSS neoprene-coated 1 KG dumbbells with hexagonal, non-rolling ends and clear weight markings. Compact hand weights shown in home workout settings, ideal for light strength and resistance training.

comparison_points.customer_benefit: Hexagonal dumbbell heads that stay put and don’t roll
comparison_points.why_it_matters: Keeps weights stable on the floor or bench, reducing trip hazards and making home workouts safer and more convenient.

comparison_points.customer_benefit: Neoprene anti-slip coating on the handles and heads
comparison_points.why_it_matters: Provides a secure, comfortable grip even with sweaty hands, helping maintain control during reps and reducing the chance of drops.

comparison_points.customer_benefit: Clear printed 1 KG weight markings and color-coded pink design
comparison_points.why_it_matters: Makes it quick to grab the correct weight at a glance, especially when training with multiple dumbbell sizes.

comparison_points.customer_benefit: Compact 1 KG pair ideal for light strength and toning exercises
comparison_points.why_it_matters: Suitable for beginners and low-impact routines, allowing controlled movements without overwhelming strain on joints.
